ygData.subject: Re: Dagnor's Cauldron
ygData.msgSnippet: hehehe until the bard takes a hit and his song is interupted ... From: Joel Thronburg  To:  Sent: Wednesday,
ygData.messageBody:
hehehe until the bard takes a hit and his song is interupted


----- Original Message -----
From: Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 1:49 PM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Dagnor's Cauldron


> From: Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...>
>
> Several caster classes get the spell. The bardsong is a party song, so
> it won't wear off in the middle of a battle.
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Tony Cawthorne [SMTP:tac1@...]
> > Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 12:55 PM
> > To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Dagnor's Cauldron
> >
> > From: "Tony Cawthorne" <tac1@...>
> >
> > Rangers also have an underwater breathing spell
> >
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...>
> > To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
> > Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 1:34 PM
> > Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Dagnor's Cauldron
> >
> >
> > > From: Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...>
> > >
> > > There was a bard that was recruting folks to go to Kedge last night
> > on
> > > the Rathe. He went inside solo earlier and said that he was the
> > only
> > > person in the zone. It is just a really tough place since you have
> > to
> > > have water breathing, bard songs or Fishbone earrings to survive
> > long
> > > enough to fight.
> > >
> > > > -----Original Message-----
> > > > From: Tony Cawthorne [SMTP:tac1@...]
> > > > Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 12:40 PM
> > > > To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> > > > Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Dagnor's Cauldron
> > > >
> > > > From: "Tony Cawthorne" <tac1@...>
> > > >
> > > > In the water there somewhere in Dagnor's is the entrance to
> > another
> > > > dungeon
> > > > called "Kedge Keep" the entire dungeon is underwater and the
> > entrance
> > > > is
> > > > guarded by two lvl 35+ swordfish, and it gets worse from there on
> > in.
> > > > Not
> > > > much more info but hopefully a little more than ye knew b4!
> > > >
> > > > Quindinar
> > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > From: <Jesper.Sallander@...>
> > > > To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
> > > > Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 1:29 PM
> > > > Subject: [EQCheats] Dagnor's Cauldron
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > > From: Jesper.Sallander@...
> > > > >
> > > > > Spooky place. Of course we all have to run through it to get to
> > > > Unrest,
> > > > but
> > > > > does anyone know anything else about this place? The only thing
> > > > I've seen
> > > > > there is Goblin Tidal Lords, which are WAAY red for me. Is this
> > the
> > > > > underwater dungeon I've heard about? Anything else in the zone?
> > I
> > > > know
> > > > > them rocky cliffs are dangerous..."You fall for 127 points of
> > > > damage"
> > > > OUCH!
> > > > > :)
